features: 🛫【Travel Must Haves Phone Mount】This travel essential phone holder helps to free up your hands and enjoy travel. You can mount it to various seat backs or tray table during a flight in order to watch a movie. Excellent for travel! 🎁 Perfect gift for family, friends, colleagues and travelers. The right choice for multiple occasions like Valentine's Day, Christmas, New Year, Birthdays, and everything.

🛫【Fairly Flexible Angle Adjustable】With multi-directional and 360 degrees rotation, this phone stand can combinate different positions, which allows you to mount and position your device to nearly any position you need it to for best viewing angle.

🛫【Small Holder With Strong Clamp】Strong clamp holds your phone perfectly so that it won't drop. The pocket size phone holder is easy to fold and take anywhere you go. Pack it in your backpack, or suitcase.

🛫【Compatible with 4.7-6.9" Devices】This cell phone holder is compatible with iPhone 14, 14 Plus,14 pro,14 pro max, 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, 12, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, mini SE, XS, XS Max, XR, X, Galaxy S22 Ultra, S21, S20, Google Pixel, Xiao'mi, etc.

🛫【A Super Practical Little Gadget】This handy little phone stand holds your phone any which way you want, all hands free. It clamps your phone vertical, horizontal, on a luggage handle, tray table, desktop, chair, shelf, bed, book, power bank or even as a short selfie stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy phone stand/clamp that is incredibly versatile!
reviews.reviewText: Design and Build Quality:The MiiKARE versatile smartphone clamp cell phone stand has an ergonomic and versatile design that caught my attention. The build quality feels sturdy, and the materials used are durable. The clamp mechanism is well-engineered, providing a secure grip on my smartphone without causing any scratches or damage.Versatility and Adjustability:One of the standout features of this cell phone stand is its versatility and adjustability. The clamp design allows for compatibility with various smartphone sizes, and the adjustable arms and angles make it easy to find the perfect viewing position. Whether I'm watching videos, participating in video calls, or working, the stand provides the flexibility I need.Ease of Use:The clamp mechanism is user-friendly, and the adjustable features are intuitive. I appreciate the quick and hassle-free adjustment options, allowing me to switch between landscape and portrait modes effortlessly. The ease of use adds to the overall convenience of the product.Stability and Durability:Stability is a crucial factor for any phone stand, and the MiiKARE clamp stand delivers in this aspect. The base is stable, and the clamp holds the phone securely in place. I haven't experienced any wobbling or instability during use. Additionally, the durability of the materials suggests that this stand is built to last.Portability and Compactness:The MiiKARE cell phone stand is designed with portability in mind. It's compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry in a bag or pocket. The foldable design is a thoughtful addition, allowing for convenient storage when not in use. This feature makes it an excellent companion for travel or on-the-go use.Value for Money:Considering the build quality, versatility, and ease of use, the MiiKARE versatile smartphone clamp cell phone stand offers great value for money. It competes well with other products in its category, providing premium features at a reasonable price point.Conclusion:In conclusion, the MiiKARE versatile smartphone clamp cell phone stand impresses with its design, versatility, and durability. Whether you're a frequent traveler, content consumer, or someone who uses their phone for work, this stand provides a reliable and convenient solution. It's a well-rounded accessory that enhances the overall smartphone experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and versatile piece of equipment!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I needed something to use to hold my phone. I had snapped my last phone holder. I found this one. I carefully studied the photos and figured out it would be perfect for what I need. It says airline phone holder but this can clip to a desk, chair, small pole, really the possibilities are endless. The clip feels like it was made with a heavy spring, creating a strong grip. This will not fall off, even when bumped into, it continues to have a sturdy firm grip. The phone clip is adjustable and also has a good solid firm grip on my phone. If you have a pop socket, you can put the clip of the phone holder either above or below where you have your pop socket. Even though it's slightly off centered because of the phone being clipped different, this thing holds tight! I can think of ways to use it on long car rides. Just clip it to the headrest pole. Or inside the seat. It can also be used by itself as a phone stand to watch videos. I watch a lot of YouTube so I'm gonna try it out by itself. It's so crazy how strong the clip is. The material used to make the phone holder feels like a solid hard material, probably plastic, but very sturdy and does not feel easy to break. It does not wobble whatsoever. It appears and feels very durable.This twists 360° at the elbow piece in the middle. You can adjust this item to any way you could possibly need. The elbow piece works like an elbow, and can only bend one way, but twisting the product around at the elbow should get you any angle you could possibly need. And, it can be folded away for easy storage. This will easily fit into a purse, bag or even pocket.I highly recommend this! Even if you don't fly, you can use it on car trips or even sitting at home. I just took a video (sorry that it's so dark, it's raining today) and used a planner book (because I'm on my phone) and showed the many different ways it twists and turns. It clips very nicely to my desk where I play my video games. I use this to hold my phone for easy access while gaming to look up how to do something in games. You can use it in the office, car, truck, anywhere that has a place to clip it. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very useful gadget
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and it holds my phone well, only thing is I wish it was made out of a little better materials and had a couple more adjustments. Other than that it's still a very useful product and I would definitely recommend anybody use one especially if they're in their kitchen a lot it helps being able to watch your phone while you work. I'm very interested in the other products they offer and see what other innovative ideas they have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this device! It’s super versatile as far as where it can be used…..airplanes, automobiles, homes, school, work. I have three of them. One in my car, one at home & one for travel. It’s easy to use and there’s many different ways it can hold your phone and clip onto whatever you need it clipped to.It folds up nice & compact too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile phone holder that is stable and stays in place
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to use and can cover a complete 360 degrees depending on the angle you need. It definitely helped my neck and freed up my hands since it has a sturdy clamp and I was able to clamp it on firmly to the tray table while the table was in a locked position. It folds down into about a 3"-4" rectangle for easy packing too. Definitely great value for the price. Glad I purchased this to use during my travels!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for Holding your Phone on the plane
reviews.reviewText: This product worked as good as described. I was able to attach it to the back of the seat infront of me on Spirit airlines, with my phone inserted. I have an Iphone 14 max Pro with an otterbox case and it held it beautifully. There was turbulence on the trip, but it held up and I was able to watch my movies the whole way perfectly! What a great invention!
cet accessoire m'a été d'une grande utilité lors de mon voyage aux USAil est solide et peut se poser sur beaucoup de chose, n'est jamais tomber quand mon téléphone (iPhone 11) était dessus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived on time and it is good quality also quick and safe deliver. Perfect way to watch movies in low budget airlines

reviews.reviewTitle: Solide und günstige Handyhalterung für den Schreibtisch
reviews.reviewText: Die Handyhalterung wirkt beim Auspacken solide und macht einen wertigen Eindruck. Die Anleitung ist minimalistisch aber ausreichend, da das Produkt quasi selbsterklärend ist. Im geschlossenen Zustand ist die Halterung relativ kompakt und passt beispielsweise bequem in die Jackentasche.Beim Aufklappen des Halters fällt auf, dass man viele Freiheitsgrade hat, um die Gelenke zu drehen und einzustellen. Dabei rasten die Gelenke an vorgegebenen Stellen und Winkeln ein. Die Abstufung der Winkel ist fein genug, um vielfältige Position zuzulassen. Gleichzeitig sorgt das Einrasten vor allem für Stabilität und einmal eingestellt bleibt der Halte in der gewählten Position. Selbst bei ausführlichem Tippen auf dem Touchscreen des Handys klappt die Halterung nicht weg oder ändert ihre Neigung.Die Halterung ist darauf ausgelegt, an Tischen oder Kanten festgemacht zu werden. Über eine Klammer mit Spannfeder lässt sich die Halterung an Tischplatten festklemmen. Dazu lässt sich die Klammer problemlos bis ca. 2cm öffnen. Laut Anleitung sollte die Halterung auch an Tischplatten mit bis zu 4 cm Dicke passen. Um dies zu erreichen muss man allerdings ordentlich Kraft aufbringen, um die Klammer so weit zu öffnen. Andererseits sorgt die kräftige Feder aber auch dafür, dass die Halterung stabil an der Tischkante sitzt.Die Halterung ist passend für aktuelle Smartphones. Getestet habe ich die Halterung mit einem iPhone XR, einem Pixel 6a und einem Samsung S8, jeweils mit und ohne Schutzhülle an den Geräten. Die Smartphones ließen sich gut montieren und saßen stabil in der Halterung.Nach etwa 4 Wochen in Benutzung haben sich keine gravierenden Schwachpunkte gezeigt und das Produkt liefert ein gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.
